package.name: greek-letters-improved
package.author: Jos√© Ferreira
package.description: A package containing most of the Greek alphabet and some common variatons using Latex based naming scheme
package.title: Greek Letters based on Latex

manifest.author: Jos√© Ferreira
manifest.description: A package containing most of the Greek alphabet and some common variatons using Latex based naming scheme
manifest.name: greek-letters-improved
manifest.title: Greek Letters based on Latex

packageRepo.readme:
# Available matches
| Trigger           | Replace   |
|-------------------|-----------|
| :Alpha:, :Œë:      | Œë         |
| :alpha:, :a:      | Œ±         |
| :Beta:, :B:       | Œí         |
| :beta:, :b:       | Œ≤         |
| :varbeta:, :vb:   | œê         |
| :Delta:, :D:      | Œî         |
| :delta:, :d:      | Œ¥         |
| :Epsilon:, :E:    | Œï         |
| :epsilon:, :e:    | œµ         |
| :varepsilon, :ve: | Œµ         |
| :Phi:, :P:        | Œ¶         |
| :phi:, :p:        | ùúô         |
| :varphi:, :vp:    | œÜ         |
| :Gamma:, :G:      | Œì         |
| :gamma:, :g:      | Œ≥         |
| :Eta:, :E:        | Œó         |
| :eta:, :e:        | Œ∑         |
| :Iota:, :I:       | Œô         |
| :iota:, :i:       | Œπ         |
| :Theta:, :T:      | Œò         |
| :theta:, :t:      | Œ∏         |
| :vartheta:, :vt:  | œë         |
| :Kappa:, :K:      | Œö         |
| :kappa:, :k:      | Œ∫         |
| :varkappa, :vk:   | œ∞         |
| :Lambda:, :L:     | Œõ         |
| :lambda:, :l:     | Œª         |
| :Mu:, :M:         | Œú         |
| :mu:, :m:         | Œº         |
| :Nu:, :N:         | Œù         |
| :nu:, :n:         | ŒΩ         |
| :Omicron:         | Œü         |
| :omicron:         | Œø         |
| :Pi:              | Œ†         |
| :pi:              | œÄ         |
| :varpi:, :vpi:    | œñ         |
| :Chi:, :C:        | Œß         |
| :chi:, :c:        | œá         |
| :Rho:, :R:        | Œ°         |
| :rho:, :r:        | œÅ         |
| :varrho, :vr:     | œ±         |
| :Sigma:, :S:      | Œ£         |
| :sigma:, :s:      | œÉ         |
| :varsigma:, :vs:  | œÇ         |
| :Tau:             | Œ§         |
| :tau:             | œÑ         |
| :Upsilon:, :U:    | Œ•         |
| :upsilon:, :u:    | œÖ         |
| :Omega:, :O:      | Œ©         |
| :omega:, :o:      | œâ         |
| :Xi:              | Œû         |
| :xi:              | Œæ         |
| :Psi:             | Œ®         |
| :varPsi:, :vPsi:  | ‚≤Æ         |
| :psi:             | œà         |
| :varpsi:, :vpsi:  | ‚≤Ø         |
| :Zeta:, :Z:       | Œñ         |
| :zeta:, :z:       | Œ∂         |

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - triggers: [":Alpha:", ":A:"]
    replace: "Œë"

  - triggers: [":alpha:", ":a:"]
    replace: "Œ±"

  - triggers: [":Beta:", ":B:"]
    replace: "Œí"

  - triggers: [":beta:", ":b:"]
    replace: "Œ≤"

  - triggers: [":varbeta:", ":vb:"]
    replace: "œê"

  - triggers: [":Delta:", ":D:"]
    replace: "Œî"

  - triggers: [":delta:", ":d:"]
    replace: "Œ¥"

  - triggers: [":Epsilon:", ":E:"]
    replace: "Œï"

  - triggers: [":epsilon:", ":e:"]
    replace: "œµ"

  - triggers: [":varepsilon", ":ve:"]
    replace: "Œµ"

  - triggers: [":Phi:", ":P:"]
    replace: "Œ¶"

  - triggers: [":phi:", ":p:"]
    replace: "ùúô"

  - triggers: [":varphi:", ":vp:"]
    replace: "œÜ"

  - triggers: [":Gamma:", ":G:"]
    replace: "Œì"

  - triggers: [":gamma:", ":g:"]
    replace: "Œ≥"

  - triggers: [":Eta:", ":E:"]
    replace: "Œó"

  - triggers: [":eta:", ":e:"]
    replace: "Œ∑"

  - triggers: [":Iota:", ":I:"]
    replace: "Œô"

  - triggers: [":iota:", ":i:"]
    replace: "Œπ"

  - triggers: [":Theta:", ":T:"]
    replace: "Œò"

  - triggers: [":theta:", ":t:"]
    replace: "Œ∏"

  - triggers: [":vartheta:", ":vt:"]
    replace: "œë"

  - triggers: [":Kappa:", ":K:"]
    replace: "Œö"

  - triggers: [":kappa:", ":k:"]
    replace: "Œ∫"

  - triggers: [":varkappa", ":vk:"]
    replace: "œ∞"

  - triggers: [":Lambda:", ":L:"]
    replace: "Œõ"

  - triggers: [":lambda:", ":l:"]
    replace: "Œª"

  - triggers: [":Mu:", ":M:"]
    replace: "Œú"

  - triggers: [":mu:", ":m:"]
    replace: "Œº"

  - triggers: [":Nu:", ":N:"]
    replace: "Œù"

  - triggers: [":nu:", ":n:"]
    replace: "ŒΩ"

  - trigger: ":Omicron:"
    replace: "Œü"

  - trigger: ":omicron:"
    replace: "Œø"

  - trigger: ":Pi:"
    replace: "Œ†"

  - trigger: ":pi:"
    replace: "œÄ"

  - triggers: [":varpi:", ":vpi:"]
    replace: "œñ"

  - triggers: [":Chi:", ":C:"]
    replace: "Œß"

  - triggers: [":chi:", ":c:"]
    replace: "œá"

  - triggers: [":Rho:", ":R:"]
    replace: "Œ°"

  - triggers: [":rho:", ":r:"]
    replace: "œÅ"

  - triggers: [":varrho", ":vr:"]
    replace: "œ±"

  - triggers: [":Sigma:", ":S:"]
    replace: "Œ£"

  - triggers: [":sigma:", ":s:"]
    replace: "œÉ"

  - triggers: [":varsigma:", ":vs:"]
    replace: "œÇ"

  - trigger: ":Tau:"
    replace: "Œ§"

  - trigger: ":tau:"
    replace: "œÑ"

  - triggers: [":Upsilon:", ":U:"]
    replace: "Œ•"

  - triggers: [":upsilon:", ":u:"]
    replace: "œÖ"

  - triggers: [":Omega:", ":O:"]
    replace: "Œ©"

  - triggers: [":omega:", ":o:"]
    replace: "œâ"

  - trigger: ":Xi:"
    replace: "Œû"

  - trigger: ":xi:"
    replace: "Œæ"

  - trigger: ":Psi:"
    replace: "Œ®"

  - triggers: [":varPsi:", ":vPsi:"]
    replace: "‚≤Æ"

  - trigger: ":psi:"
    replace: "œà"

  - triggers: [":varpsi:", ":vpsi:"]
    replace: "‚≤Ø"

  - triggers: [":Zeta:", ":Z:"]
    replace: "Œñ"

  - triggers: [":zeta:", ":z:"]
    replace: "Œ∂"
